summary: The diff implements approximately 30-40% of the requested UX enhancements. It includes skeleton loading states, empty states, error displays, success animations, button states, mobile navigation, sponsor banners, tournament card redesign, registration success modal, status badges, progress bars, and countdown timers. However, many requirements are only partially implemented or missing entirely, including comprehensive mobile responsiveness, page transitions, filter enhancements, quick actions menu, wallet streamlining, complete contrast improvements, spacing systems, and full sponsor banner integration across all pages.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement skeleton loading screens across all major pages (TournamentDashboard, TournamentDetailPage, LeaderboardPage, ProfilePage, WalletPage, NotificationsPage, StatisticsDashboard, SquadsPage, ReferralDashboard, AdminDashboard)
missing_requirements.reason: SkeletonLoader component created but only integrated into TournamentDashboard. No evidence of skeleton screens in TournamentDetailPage, LeaderboardPage, ProfilePage, WalletPage, NotificationsPage, StatisticsDashboard, SquadsPage, ReferralDashboard, or AdminDashboard.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create helpful and specific error messages throughout the application that clearly explain what went wrong and provide actionable next steps
missing_requirements.reason: ErrorDisplay component and errorMessages utility created, but no evidence of integration into actual pages or error handling flows in TournamentDetailPage, WalletPage, ProfilePage, or other major components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Design empty state screens for all list and collection views including tournament lists, notifications, wallet transactions, squad members, and leaderboards
missing_requirements.reason: EmptyState component created but only used in PracticeModeSection. No evidence of empty states in wallet transaction list, notifications center, squad member lists, or leaderboards.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add success animations and visual feedback for key user actions including tournament registration confirmation, profile update success, wallet transaction submission, squad creation, comment posting, and admin operations
missing_requirements.reason: SuccessAnimation component created but only RegistrationSuccessModal shows evidence of integration. No evidence of success feedback for profile updates, wallet transactions, squad creation, comment posting, or admin operations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enhance mobile responsiveness across all pages by improving touch targets to minimum 44px, optimizing layouts for small screens with single-column stacking, ensuring readable font sizes, making navigation menus mobile-friendly with hamburger menu or bottom nav, ensuring all modals and forms are usable on phone screens
missing_requirements.reason: MobileNav component created but no evidence of 44px touch targets across all pages, systematic layout stacking optimizations, font size adjustments, or mobile-optimized modals and forms in existing components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reorganize the Header navigation menu for better information architecture by grouping related features together, prioritizing frequently accessed pages in primary navigation, moving secondary features to a sub-menu or user dropdown
missing_requirements.reason: MobileNav shows improved structure, but no evidence of Header.tsx reorganization for desktop navigation with primary/secondary grouping and dropdown sub-menus.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enhance search and filter UX on TournamentDashboard by making TournamentFilters more intuitive with larger touch targets, real-time result count updates, visual feedback when filters are active, Clear All Filters button, and improved mobile layout
missing_requirements.reason: TournamentDashboard shows collapsible filters but no evidence of 44px touch targets, real-time result count display, active filter visual indicators, or Clear All Filters button implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add shortcuts and quick access features to frequently used sections by creating a Quick Actions floating action button or menu that provides one-click access to My Tournaments, Register for Tournament, Check Wallet Balance, and View Notifications
missing_requirements.reason: QuickActionsMenu component created but no evidence of integration into any pages or App.tsx layout.

missing_requirements.requirement: Streamline wallet transaction flow on WalletPage by redesigning deposit and withdrawal cards with simplified forms requiring fewer fields, adding visual feedback for pending transactions, improving transaction history display with better categorization and filtering options
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to WalletPage or TransactionList showing simplified forms, pending transaction badges, or filtering options.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement smooth page transitions throughout the application using fade-in animations when navigating between routes, smooth slide-in animations for modals and side panels, gentle fade animations for content appearing after loading
missing_requirements.reason: PageTransition and ModalTransition components created but only PageTransition used in TournamentDashboard. No evidence of integration into other pages, routes, or modal components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Improve contrast and readability across all UI components by ensuring text meets WCAG AA contrast standards, increasing font sizes for critical information, adjusting neon colors where they compromise readability, ensuring all interactive elements have sufficient visual weight
missing_requirements.reason: No systematic evidence of contrast auditing or font size increases across components. Only TournamentCard shows larger prize pool typography but no comprehensive WCAG AA compliance verification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply consistent spacing and alignment across all pages and components by establishing a unified spacing system using multiples of 4px, ensuring consistent padding and margins for cards and containers, standardizing gap spacing in grid and flex layouts
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of systematic spacing refactoring across components to implement 4px base unit system or consistent padding/margin standards.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create engaging button states with clear visual feedback by implementing hover effects with neon glow intensification, active/pressed states with subtle scale transform, disabled states with reduced opacity and grayscale filter, loading states with spinner animations
missing_requirements.reason: LoadingButton component created but no evidence of systematic hover, active, and disabled state enhancements across existing button usage in components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build a new enhanced sponsor visibility system that displays animated sponsor banners on all major pages including TournamentDashboard, TournamentDetailPage, AdminDashboard, LeaderboardPage, ProfilePage, WalletPage, NotificationsPage, StatisticsDashboard, SquadsPage, and ReferralDashboard
missing_requirements.reason: SponsorBanner component created and integrated into TournamentDashboard only. Missing from TournamentDetailPage, AdminDashboard, LeaderboardPage, ProfilePage, WalletPage, NotificationsPage, StatisticsDashboard, SquadsPage, and ReferralDashboard.
